content.query:
--Script generated from Bulk Load Wizard

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'OrdersByState' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE Orders.OrdersByState
	(
	 [StateProvince] nvarchar(30),
	 [TotalOrders] bigint
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_OrdersByState
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO Orders.OrdersByState
(StateProvince 1, TotalOrders 2)
FROM 'https://synapse580.dfs.core.windows.net/curateddata/orders/OrdersByState'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM Orders.OrdersByState
GO
